text: Shannon Miller (born March 10, 1977) is an American gymnast. She was born in Rolla, Missouri. She moved to Edmond, Oklahoma when she was six months old. She is the most decorated artistic gymnastics performer in the history of the United States. She was the 1993 and 1994 World All-Around Champion and 1996 Summer Olympics balance beam gold medalist. Shannon won a combined total of 16 World Champion and Olympic medals between 1991 and 1996. She was also the most successful United States athlete at the 1992 Summer Olympics in Barcelona, receiving five medals overall. ==References== ==Other websites== *Shannon Miller at USA Gymnastics * Category:American gymnasts Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Medalists at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma Category:Sportspeople from Missouri Category:1977 births Category:Living people
title: Shannon Miller
